textBeforeTable: 2009 FBA Awards This is the current list of the past FBA Awards. We are aware that this list is not complete and we are requesting anyone that finds an error or addition to please send us an email to fba@barflair.org to help us make this complete. Place your mouse on the Award Name in the right column for a pop-up description of the awards. Every July through December FBA Members vote for these FBA Awards in the FBA Members Lounge.
